name: webchess
description: A two-player online chess system with real-time gameplay and practice mode

scripts.test:browser:
echo '
🌐 Browser Testing Instructions:

1. Open public/test-runner.html in your web browser
2. Click "Run All Browser Tests" to execute the complete test suite
3. Individual test categories can be run separately:
   - Browser Environment Tests: DOM elements and localStorage
   - Mobile Compatibility Tests: Mobile-specific functionality
   - Game Integration Tests: WebChess game logic integration

📊 For complete test coverage including server-side logic, use: npm test
'
scripts.daemon:install: sudo cp deployment/webchess.service /etc/systemd/system/ && sudo systemctl daemon-reload
